bba.title: MoU between Vishwa Vishwani Institutions and Brainovision Solutions India Pvt. Ltd.
description: Vishwa Vishwani Institutions has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Brainovision Solutions India Pvt. Ltd. to strengthen industry-academic collaboration.
This MoU aims to enhance students' skills by providing training, internships, workshops, and certification courses in emerging technologies.

bba.title: Faculty Development Program (FDP) on Research Methodology
description: Vishwa Vishwani Institutions successfully conducted an FDP on Research Methodology aimed at enhancing research skills among faculty.
The FDP focused on identifying research gaps, developing research models, and hypothesis building.

mba.title: Anti-Drug Awareness Programme
description: An Anti-Drug Awareness Programme was conducted at Vishwa Vishwani Campus in collaboration with the Cyberabad Police Commissionerate.
Students took a pledge against drug abuse and actively participated in awareness activities.

mba.title: Guest Talk on Startup Madness
description: Mr. Harshvardhan Jain, Founder of FlapLive, delivered an insightful session on Startup Madness.
He shared practical experiences and lessons from the startup ecosystem.
